Package com.example.airplanned.model

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.airplanned.model.Post
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    public class Post
extends Object
implements Serializable
    the purpose of this class is to create an post object each post will include an image, title, description, likes, comments, date, and publisher
    Author:
    Saiyara Iftekharuzzaman
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Post​(Post a)
      this is a copy constructor for posts
      Post​(String postImage, String postTitle, String description, User publisher)
      this is a post object constructor has a set value for the post likes, and date to start off, also creates a blank list of comments
      Post​(String postImage, String postTitle, String description, String postDate, User publisher, int likesCounter, ArrayList<Comment> comments)
      post constructor the likes and comments start at 0 and null this will be altered based on user interaction --> if a user comments then it should append the comment string to the specific users post, and likewise the like counter should update if user likes the image

    • Constructor Detail

      • Post

        public Post​(String postImage,
            String postTitle,
            String description,
            String postDate,
            User publisher,
            int likesCounter,
            ArrayList<Comment> comments)
        post constructor the likes and comments start at 0 and null this will be altered based on user interaction --> if a user comments then it should append the comment string to the specific users post, and likewise the like counter should update if user likes the image
        Parameters:
        postImage - Post's image
        postTitle - Post's title
        description - Post's description
        postDate - Post's date
        publisher - Posts's publisher
        likesCounter - Post's likes
        comments - Post's comments

      • Post

        public Post​(String postImage,
            String postTitle,
            String description,
            User publisher)
        this is a post object constructor has a set value for the post likes, and date to start off, also creates a blank list of comments
        Parameters:
        postImage - Post's image
        postTitle - Post's title
        description - Post's description
        publisher - Post's author
